SELECT DatePart(yy, dds.BILL_DATE) AS year, --substring(replace(convert(varchar(30),dds.BILL_DATE,106),' ','-'),4,3) AS month, CASE WHEN DatePart(mm, dds.BILL_DATE)=1 THEN 'Jan' WHEN DatePart(mm, dds.BILL_DATE)=2 THEN 'Feb' WHEN DatePart(mm, dds.BILL_DATE)=3 THEN 'Mar' WHEN DatePart(mm, dds.BILL_DATE)=4 THEN 'Apr' WHEN DatePart(mm, dds.BILL_DATE)=5 THEN 'May' WHEN DatePart(mm, dds.BILL_DATE)=6 THEN 'Jun' WHEN DatePart(mm, dds.BILL_DATE)=7 THEN 'Jul' WHEN DatePart(mm, dds.BILL_DATE)=8 THEN 'Aug' WHEN DatePart(mm, dds.BILL_DATE)=9 THEN 'Sep' WHEN DatePart(mm, dds.BILL_DATE)=10 THEN 'Oct' WHEN DatePart(mm, dds.BILL_DATE)=11 THEN 'Nov' ELSE 'Dec' END AS month, --'',--DatePart(wk, dds.BILL_DATE) AS week, (SELECT CAL_WEEK FROM MDM_CALENDAR WHERE CAL_YEAR=DatePart(yy, dds.BILL_DATE) AND CAL_DATE=CONVERT(varchar(10), dds.BILL_DATE, 120 )) as week, dds.BILL_DATE, bo.PN2, bo.ORG_NAME, md.DIST_NAME, banner.ITEM_NAME, ms.STORE_CODE, ms.STORE_NAME, type.ITEM_NAME, channel.ITEM_NAME, ms.STORE_ADDR, brand.ITEM_NAME, mp.PROD_CODE, mp.PROD_NAME_EN,
dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, 340, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.PROD_QUANTITY) AS EA, dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, 339, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.PROD_QUANTITY) AS CT, dbo.fn_getUnitConvById(dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID, 341, dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE, dds.PROD_QUANTITY)/100 AS QLI, dds.PROD_AMOUNT
FROM DMS_DATA_SALE dds INNER JOIN DMS_PROD_MAPPING dpm ON dds.PROD_CODE = dpm.DIST_PROD_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID = dpm.CLIENT_ID AND dds.PROD_UNIT=dpm.DIST_PROD_UNIT AND dds.PROD_NAME=dpm.DIST_PROD_NAME INNER JOIN MDM_PRODUCT mp ON mp.PROD_CODE = dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE INNER JOIN DMS_STORE_MAPPING dsm ON dds.STORE_CODE = dsm.DIST_STORE_CODE AND dds.CLIENT_ID=dsm.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN MDM_STORE ms ON ms.STORE_CODE = dsm.TARGET_STORE_CODE
LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM brand ON brand.DICT_ITEM_ID=mp.BRAND_ID AND brand.DICT_ID='prodBrand' LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM banner ON banner.DICT_ITEM_ID=ms.CORP_ID AND banner.DICT_ID='storeCorp' LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM type ON type.DICT_ITEM_ID=ms.NATURE_ID AND type.DICT_ID='storeNature' LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM channel ON channel.DICT_ITEM_ID=ms.TYPE_ID AND channel.DICT_ID='storeType'
LEFT JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dc.CLIENT_ID = dds.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR md ON md.DIST_ID = dc.DIST_ID AND ms.DIST_ID=md.DIST_ID LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG bo ON bo.ORG_ID=md.ORG_ID
WHERE $startDate$ $endDate$ $distId$ $channelId$ $typeId$ $bannerId$ $simsOrgId$ $storeCode$ $storeName$ $brandId$ $prodCode$ $orgSubCode$ AND dds.STATE=1 and mp.PROD_CODE not in ('zengpin','qita','tingchan')
